#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mx 100001
using namespace std;
typedef  int ll;
vector<int>visited(mx);
char str[51];
ll n;
map<string,int>Map;
map<string,int>::iterator it;
int main() 
{
	
	cin>>n;
	while(n--)
	{
		cin>>str;
		Map[str]++;
		if((visited[Map[str]])==0)
		{
			cout<<Map[str]<<" "<<str<<endl;
			visited[Map[str]]=1;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
